For anyone interested in medical, science, and technical writing, this page offers a curated collection of resources. It provides practical introductions to medical, science, and technical writing, style guidelines, and challenges.

1)  [Academic Phrasebank](https://www.phrasebank.manchester.ac.uk/)
2)  [Excelsior Online Writing Lab](https://owl.excelsior.edu/grammar-essentials/)

4)  [Quick and Dirty Tips](https://www.quickanddirtytips.com/grammar-girl/)
5)  [Inter-Biotech: Biomedical Language Editing](http://www.inter-biotech.com/biowc/style.html)
6)  [Features of academic writing](http://www.uefap.com/writing/feature/featfram.htm)
7)  [American Copy Editors Series](http://grammarguide.copydesk.org/resources/)

9) [Introduction to Common Errors in English Usage](https://brians.wsu.edu/common-errors-in-english-usage/)
